amendment.description: To establish criteria for placing individuals on the consolidated screening watch list of the Terrorist Screening Center, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3915 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3915 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S10338-10339; text: CR S10338) To establish criteria for placing individuals on the consolidated screening watch list of the Terrorist Screening Center, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3915 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3915 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy.
